sentences.en: A bumper wheat harvest is anticipated [ expected ] this year.
sentences.cn: 今年小麦 可望 获得丰收.

sentences.en: By cereals we mean wheat, oats, rye, barley, and all that.
sentences.cn: 谈到谷物,我们指的是小麦 、 燕麦 、 黑麦 、 大麦之类的东西.

sentences.en: He hefted a sack of wheat to see how heavy it was.
sentences.cn: 他举起一袋麦子看看有多重.

sentences.en: He raises 2,000 acres of wheat and hay.
sentences.cn: 他种植了2,000英亩的小麦和牧草。

sentences.en: I take wheat and yeast tablets daily to purify the blood.
sentences.cn: 我每天服用干酵母片以净化血液。

sentences.en: In the swift the day before that year's wheat harvest, a rainstorm threatened.
sentences.cn: 在那一年麦收的前一天, 一场暴雨眼看就要来临.

sentences.en: It isn't always easy to separate the wheat from the chaff.
sentences.cn: 分清良莠并不总是很容易。

sentences.en: It would pay farmers to plough up the scrub and plant wheat.
sentences.cn: 它会出钱雇农民开垦这块低矮丛林来种植麦子。

sentences.en: The aphid is now laying waste to the wheat and barley fields.
sentences.cn: 蚜虫正在毁掉一片片的小麦和大麦田地。

sentences.en: The local people bartered wheat for tools.
sentences.cn: 当地人用小麦换取工具。

sentences.en: They had been forced to uproot their vines and plant wheat.
sentences.cn: 他们已被迫将葡萄藤连根拔除，改种小麦。

sentences.en: They have been bartering wheat for cotton and timber.
sentences.cn: 他们一直用小麦交换棉花和木材。

sentences.en: We had to come around by the wheat fields.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不绕着麦田而过.

sentences.en: Wheat was in surplus that year.
World stocks of wheat were getting very low.
sentences.cn: 全球小麦储备严重不足。

phrases.phrase: separate the wheat from the chaff

trans.tran_en: the grain that bread is made from, or the plant that it grows on
